Kyle Bignell Front End Development

UK based software engineer specialising in front end development with leadership experience.

Contact
LinkedIn

Services

These are the core services I provide. If you have equivalent or similar work that you think I would be suitable for feel free to contact me with details.

JavaScript / TypeScript development

With over 8 years of JavaScript and TypeScript experience in both team member and lead roles I can help deliver your JavaScript/TypeScript requirements. I have delivered new product developments, system modernisations, as well long term maintenance of JavaScript/TypeScript projects.

Website delivery

I can help deliver your new website or implement updates to existing systems. With a wealth of experience working in full stack development as well as alongside engineering and project management teams I can integrate with your existing teams or deliver independently.

React applications

I can supply updates to existing React setups or the development of new applications. I have experience integrating React as a sub-system of a larger JavaScript/TypeScript framework as well as the sole framework for new project builds.

Google Publisher Tag Integrations

Through extensive experience leading a bespoke JavaScript framework built on top of Google Publisher Tag at Future PLC I am capable of delivering full site integrations as well as bespoke feature requests. I am also available to consult on existing integrations if you would like to work together on optimising your setup.

Skills

The skills I use to deliver my services. This is a subset of my experience so please reach out if you have other requirements.

JavaScript

Proficient in modern JavaScript and web APIS. Experienced in optimising page performance for Google core web vitals.

TypeScript

Extensive experience in developing TypeScript applications, covering the construction of new systems and the migration of legacy JavaScript frameworks.

Node.js

Having used Node.js to write many development tools as well as using it to build the backend for multiple web applications I am comfortable in the language.

HTML / CSS

Experienced in modern HTML and CSS standards as well as tools such as Sass and PostCSS.

React

Capable of designing and building new applications or aiding in the maintenance of existing systems.

Kubernetes

Experience deploying dozens of web projects using Kubernetes, including Docker image creation, Nginx server configuration, and metric/logging integrations.

Experience

Across 4 roles I have over 8 years of front end development experience. Within that I have spent over 5 years leading teams to the completion of many projects.

  1. Technical Lead at Future plc

    May 2018 - Present

    As a front end development focused technical lead my work ensures that the proprietary ad technology stack of this FTSE 250 company operates reliably to effectively monetise the page visits of our 300+ million online visitors driving £100+ million in revenue per year. I achieve this through the implementation of monitoring and logging systems, educating on the value of reliability within my team, and through a deep understanding of the systems we are responsible for.

  2. Technical Lead at Red7Mobile

    Jan 2017 - May 2018

    As a technical lead I helped to lead 15+ developers in producing high quality HTML5/JavaScript games alongside my game development responsibilities. Acting as a bridge between art, sound, design, project management, and development teams I gained a valuable understanding of business operations and how to coordinate across different domains whilst delivering to aggressive timelines.

  3. Web Games Developer at Red7Mobile

    May 2015 - Dec 2016

    Developing HTML5/JavaScript games for the gambling industry using WebGL and Web Audio based frameworks. Alongside development I also led initiatives to improve development processes at the company. This included the automation of game builds to eliminate mistakes from manual processes and the standardisation on the use of pull requests in all development work.

  4. Software Developer at CCFE

    Jul 2013 - Jun 2014

    Primarily focused on PHP and JavaScript development I helped to maintain data presentation systems that aided scientists in their fusion research. I also undertook a rewrite and modernisation of a PHP/JavaScript based data dictionary application to better serve its users making use of JavaScript data presentation frameworks.
